name: MILITARY_UNIT_INFO
description: This table contains a variety of information about the military unit. The table includes columns describing the unit's location, branch of service, ID number, alias, etc.

columns.name: UNIT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the military unit's record.

columns.name: UNIT_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the name of the military unit's record.

columns.name: RECORD_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the name of the military unit's record.
